levels.description:
Passive Effect: Ore 'Killer' Attack Range expands, and detonating one detonates all armed Ore 'Killers' simultaneously; all enemies in range take <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage <@ba.vup>twice</>, and have <@ba.vup>-{-def:0%}</> DEF (does not stack) for <@ba.vup>{duration}</>s
Active Effect: obtain an Ore 'Killer' immediately
